alert.note: Alert for Craig; Nowata; Ottawa; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:50PM CDT until July 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Washington County in northeastern Oklahoma... Nowata County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 550 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of St. Paul to 6 miles south of Elk City, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Dewey... Commerce... Quapaw... South Coffeyville... Copan... Welch... Delaware... Lenapah... Wann... Picher... Cardin... Hollow... Centrailia... Centralia... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
